name: GeistZeit (demo)
description:
You wake up in an abandoned spaceship somewhere among the stars. All the passengers are gone, and the onboard computer is silent. You get a strange device, which seems to interact with time ...

It doesn’t matter if you try to figure out what happened here, or if you just try to leave the dead spaceship. What really matters is to remember that time may be on your side, but it is not your friend.

This is our first project, and we are eager to know what you think of it. Your comments will help us to understand if we should move the game forward. 

If you like what we do, you can support us by subscribing to our Patreon
